Melhor jogo que existe! Porem tem muitos cheaters...
Muito legal jogar com os amigos

Me parece un juego entretenido, no solo por lo dinámico que es, sino también porque se tiene que pensar estrategias y saber que hacer en cada momento, también podes experimentar un poco lo que es la adrenalina cuando quedan 3 vs 1 y eso hace que sea emocionante.
игра весёлая если проходить карты  маньяк или coop
is baba, aber ich will nur für steam awards 100xp :)
It's a must have for pc gaming. There is no better competitive game out there.

Gra jest spoko lecz to ze jest za free sprawia ze jest duzo cheaterow ale jakby nie patrzec jesli mamy konta prime nie ma tych cheaterow ale (znowu) cheaterzy odpychaja od gry nowych graczy bez prime :| 7/10
Brilliant. Fun as a casual game with friends, and fun as a competitive shooter with your other friends. The new missions/operation are great fun, especially the co-op story.
Nearly 6 Years CSGO and still going strong because it still rocks!
супер что я купил это говно

Acompanho desde o 1.5.
Jogo que nos mantem fiel.

After playing this game for a few hours I have to say that I have experienced many times where rotating from one side of the map to another just takes too long. So I will kindly ask this one question that I'm sure many players have asked aswell. Valve please make the cars driveable. I hate rotating from long on dust 2 all the way to B site when the CT spawn is well protected by the opponents. I see that there are some vehicles scattered around on some of the maps and it would be very helpful being able to hop in one of those and drift my way into B site blasting Running in the 90's and hopefully turning some enemies into roadkill, just like when I drive near schoolzones on my way to McDonalds. Thank you valve.
Fajna gra .pozwalająca na prace zespołową drużyny. Fajne mapy.
Игра хорошая , но работа патруля ожидает лучшего
Bardzo fajna oraz przyjemna giereczka. pozdrawiam cieplutko
un joc plin de codati :) o pierdere totala de timp
O jogo que mais te promove amor e ódio. Impossível largar essa maravilha!
